metadata.title: Women's Soft Back Lingerie Band Extender Stretchy Bra Strap Extenders with 1 Hooks
features: Material: durable soft elastic cotton. Comfort to your sensitive skin
Easily hooks onto most 1 hook bras
Increase your size range with this simple item. Reduces bra tightness due to shrinkage, pregnancy, or weight gain
Soft, flexible and comfortable design, and easy to use wash
Package included: 6 pcs of bra extenders(1 hook 3 rows). All are black
description: Whether you're in-between sizes or experiencing maternity weight gain, bra extenders give you the breathing room you need to tackle life's other challenges. They simply attach to the hooks on your bra band, providing you a little more breathing room and extending the life of your favorite bra. Ultra Soft comfort to your sensitive skin.
